alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 22 at 2:59PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northwestern Gulf, southeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 345 PM EST/245 PM CST/... At 258 PM EST/158 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Chattahoochee to near Tyndall Air Force Base. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Altha, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Clarksville and Ocheesee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty
